metadata.description: Comprehensive Zeshto Natural Soap and Hair Care recommendations based on skin issues, skin types, and lifestyle groups

zeshto_purity_guard.name: Zeshto Purity Guard
zeshto_purity_guard.ayurvedic_properties: Both Tulsi and Neem are highly regarded in Ayurveda for their healing properties

zeshto_radiance_glow.name: Zeshto Radiance Glow
zeshto_radiance_glow.active_compounds: Lactic Acid from milk provides gentle AHA exfoliation

zeshto_heritage_glow.name: Zeshto Heritage Glow
zeshto_heritage_glow.traditional_significance: Combination traditionally gentle and effective for even, glowing tone

zeshto_calm_essence.name: Zeshto Calm Essence
zeshto_calm_essence.active_compounds: Vitamin A, Lactic Acid from goat milk

zeshto_desert_essence.name: Zeshto Desert Essence (With Scrub)
zeshto_desert_essence.active_compounds: Oudh essential oils with natural exfoliating particles

zeshto_charluna_glow.name: Zeshto CharLuna Glow
zeshto_charluna_glow.active_compounds: Charcoal and Kaolin Clay for detoxification

zeshto_mint_aura.name: Zeshto Mint Aura
zeshto_mint_aura.active_compounds: Menthol for cooling; Activated Charcoal and Bentonite Clay for sebum absorption

zeshto_amber_calm.name: Zeshto Amber Calm
zeshto_amber_calm.active_compounds: Clove and Vanilla for anti-inflammatory and antioxidant effects; Charcoal for gentle detox

zeshto_hair_vitalizer.name: Zeshto Hair Vitalizer Shampoo Bar
zeshto_hair_vitalizer.active_compounds: Natural saponins from Reeta and Shikakai, Vitamin C from Amla

acne_pimple.description: Recommendations for acne-prone skin with active breakouts

oily_skin.benefits_explanation: Both are highly regarded in Ayurveda for their antimicrobial, antibacterial, and anti-inflammatory properties. Neem helps control excess oil (sebum) production and is potent against acne-causing bacteria. Tulsi further purifies the skin, helps soothe inflammation and redness associated with breakouts, and aids in reducing blemishes for a clear complexion.
oily_skin.usage_notes: Ideal for daily use on oily, acne-prone skin

dry_skin.ingredients: Pure Lily Extract, Vetiver Essential Oil, Activated Charcoal Powder, Natural Kaolin Clay
dry_skin.benefits_explanation: Gentle detox and pore cleansing; charcoal and clay detoxify pores without stripping the skin.
dry_skin.usage_notes: Suitable for dry, acne-prone skin; follow with moisturizer for best results.

dull_skin.benefits_explanation: The purifying and cleansing action of these ingredients helps detoxify the skin and remove impurities that contribute to dullness. Their anti-acne benefits ensure a clearer, healthier-looking surface.
dull_skin.usage_notes: Helps restore natural radiance while treating acne

sensitive_skin.ingredients: Pure Lily Extract, Vetiver Essential Oil, Activated Charcoal Powder, Natural Kaolin Clay
sensitive_skin.benefits_explanation: Gentle detox and pore cleansing; charcoal and clay purify pores without stripping the skin, making it suitable for acne-prone sensitive skin.
sensitive_skin.usage_notes: Suitable for sensitive, acne-prone skin; follow with a gentle moisturizer.

dark_spots_pigmentation.description: Recommendations for hyperpigmentation, dark spots, and uneven skin tone

oily_skin.ingredients: Kokum Butter, Kesar Extract, Turmeric Powder
oily_skin.benefits_explanation: Powerful brightening and anti-inflammatory action; the concentrated Kesar and Turmeric blend helps fade dark spots, even skin tone, and calm inflammation while being suitable for oily skin.
oily_skin.usage_notes: Ideal for oily skin with dark spots; use consistently for best brightening results.

dry_skin.benefits_explanation: Kesar (Saffron) is excellent for brightening and reducing hyperpigmentation. Milk is a natural moisturizer, providing essential fats and proteins to help hydrate and nourish dry skin while the Lactic Acid gently fades marks, promoting a smoother, glowing complexion.
dry_skin.usage_notes: Provides both brightening and moisturizing benefits

dull_skin.ingredients: Kokum Butter, Kesar Extract, Turmeric Powder
dull_skin.benefits_explanation: Powerful brightening and anti-inflammatory action; the concentrated Kesar and Turmeric blend helps fade dark spots, reduce dullness, and enhance natural radiance.
dull_skin.usage_notes: Great for dull skin with pigmentation issues; use regularly for visible brightening.

sensitive_skin.ingredients: Kashmirii Kesar (Saffron), Saffron Oil, Thick Milk Cream, Shea Butter, Kokum Butter
sensitive_skin.benefits_explanation: Brightening and Anti-Aging: Saffron and Milk Cream provide powerful antioxidant and intense moisture
sensitive_skin.usage_notes: Traditional gentle formula ideal for sensitive skin

acne_scars.description: Recommendations for post-acne scarring and texture improvement

dry_skin.ingredients: Kashmirii Kesar (Saffron), Saffron Oil, Thick Milk Cream, Shea Butter, Kokum Butter
dry_skin.benefits_explanation: Brightening and anti-aging; saffron and milk cream deliver powerful antioxidants and intense moisture, helping improve the appearance of acne scars while deeply nourishing dry skin.
dry_skin.usage_notes: Ideal for dry skin with acne scars; use consistently for improved brightness and smoother texture.

oily_skin.ingredients: Kokum Butter, Kesar Extract, Turmeric Powder
oily_skin.benefits_explanation: Powerful brightening and anti-inflammatory action; the concentrated Kesar and Turmeric blend helps fade acne scars, reduce pigmentation, and calm inflammation while remaining suitable for oily skin.
oily_skin.usage_notes: Great for oily skin with acne scars; use consistently for clearer, brighter skin.

dull_skin.ingredients: Kokum Butter, Kesar Extract, Turmeric Powder
dull_skin.benefits_explanation: Powerful brightening and anti-inflammatory action; the concentrated Kesar and Turmeric blend helps fade acne scars, reduce dullness, and restore natural radiance.
dull_skin.usage_notes: Ideal for dull skin with acne scars; consistent use enhances brightness and overall skin tone.

sensitive_skin.ingredients: Kashmirii Kesar (Saffron), Saffron Oil, Thick Milk Cream, Shea Butter, Kokum Butter
sensitive_skin.benefits_explanation: Brightening and anti-aging; saffron and milk cream deliver powerful antioxidants and intense moisture, helping improve acne scars while soothing and nourishing sensitive skin.
sensitive_skin.usage_notes: Ideal for sensitive skin with acne scars; apply gently and follow with a simple moisturizer.

pigmentation.description: Recommendations for pigmentation, dark patches, and uneven skin tone

dry_skin.ingredients: Kashmirii Kesar (Saffron), Saffron Oil, Thick Milk Cream, Shea Butter, Kokum Butter
dry_skin.benefits_explanation: Brightening and anti-aging; saffron and milk cream provide powerful antioxidants and intense moisture, helping reduce pigmentation and improve overall skin tone.
dry_skin.usage_notes: Ideal for dry skin with pigmentation; use consistently for brightening and even complexion.

oily_skin.ingredients: Kokum Butter, Kesar Extract, Turmeric Powder
oily_skin.benefits_explanation: Powerful brightening and anti-inflammatory action; concentrated Kesar and Turmeric blend reduces pigmentation while keeping oily skin balanced.
oily_skin.usage_notes: Great for oily skin with pigmentation; consistent use helps control oil and improve clarity.

dull_skin.ingredients: Kokum Butter, Kesar Extract, Turmeric Powder
dull_skin.benefits_explanation: Brightening and anti-inflammatory care; helps fade pigmentation while reviving dull skin with natural radiance.
dull_skin.usage_notes: Perfect for dull skin with pigmentation; use regularly to restore brightness.

sensitive_skin.ingredients: Kashmirii Kesar (Saffron), Saffron Oil, Thick Milk Cream, Shea Butter, Kokum Butter
sensitive_skin.benefits_explanation: Brightening and anti-aging; saffron and milk cream nourish sensitive skin while gently reducing pigmentation.
sensitive_skin.usage_notes: Suitable for sensitive skin prone to pigmentation; apply gently.

dull_skin.description: Recommendations for restoring natural radiance and glow

dry_skin.ingredients: Kokum Butter, Honey, Turmeric Powder, Oats (Dalia)
dry_skin.benefits_explanation: Healing exfoliation and brightening; Oats provide gentle physical buffing while Honey and Turmeric help heal, soothe, and brighten dull, dry skin.
dry_skin.usage_notes: Ideal for dry, dull skin needing gentle exfoliation and nourishment

oily_skin.ingredients: Mint Extract, Menthol, Ylang-Ylang Oil, Activated Charcoal, Bentonite Yellow Clay
oily_skin.benefits_explanation: Aggressive oil control and clarifying; Mint and Menthol cool and stimulate the skin while Activated Charcoal and Bentonite Clay absorb excess sebum and purify dull, oily skin.
oily_skin.usage_notes: Perfect for oily, dull skin needing strong oil control and clarifying care

dull_skin_primary.ingredients: Mint Extract, Menthol, Ylang-Ylang Oil, Activated Charcoal, Bentonite Yellow Clay
dull_skin_primary.benefits_explanation: Aggressive oil control and clarifying; Mint and Menthol cool and stimulate while Activated Charcoal and Bentonite Clay absorb sebum and refresh dull skin.
dull_skin_primary.usage_notes: Ideal for persistent dullness needing clarifying and oil-balancing care

sensitive_skin.ingredients: Kokum Butter, Rose Powder, Rose Petals, French Pink Clay
sensitive_skin.benefits_explanation: Toning, balancing, and gentle detox; Rose provides natural astringency and toning while French Pink Clay offers mild detoxification suitable for sensitive, dull skin.
sensitive_skin.usage_notes: Perfect for sensitive, dull skin needing gentle toning and revitalizing care

anti_aging.description: Recommendations for anti-aging care and prevention of premature aging

dry_skin.ingredients: Kashmirii Kesar (Saffron), Saffron Oil, Thick Milk Cream, Shea Butter, Kokum Butter
dry_skin.benefits_explanation: Brightening and anti-aging; saffron and milk cream provide powerful antioxidant support and intense moisture, helping improve elasticity and reduce signs of aging in dry skin.
dry_skin.usage_notes: Deep nourishment and anti-aging hydration ideal for dry, mature skin

oily_skin.ingredients: Patchouli Essential Oil, Lime Essential Oil, Bergamot Essential Oil, AloeVera Puree
oily_skin.benefits_explanation: Purifying and balancing; Lime and Bergamot offer mild astringent action while Patchouli and AloeVera soothe, hydrate, and support anti-aging without heaviness—ideal for oily skin.
oily_skin.usage_notes: Light, non-greasy anti-aging care suitable for oily skin

dull_skin.ingredients: Patchouli, Clove, Cedar, Amber & Vanilla Essential Oil Blend, Activated Charcoal Powder, Natural Kaolin Clay
dull_skin.benefits_explanation: Antioxidant detox and calming; Clove and Vanilla provide anti-inflammatory and antioxidant benefits while gentle charcoal detox helps renew dull, aging skin.
dull_skin.usage_notes: Ideal for dull, aging skin needing detox, calmness, and renewed brightness

sensitive_skin.ingredients: Patchouli, Clove, Cedar, Amber & Vanilla Essential Oil Blend, Activated Charcoal Powder, Natural Kaolin Clay
sensitive_skin.benefits_explanation: Antioxidant detox and calming; Clove and Vanilla provide anti-inflammatory and antioxidant support while the gentle charcoal detox helps purify without irritating sensitive skin.
sensitive_skin.usage_notes: Suitable for sensitive, aging skin needing gentle detox and calming care

under_eye_dark_circle.description: Recommendations for reducing under eye dark circles and puffiness

dry_skin.ingredients: Agar Oil, Sandalwood Oil, Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter, Kokum Butter
dry_skin.benefits_explanation: Intense moisture and calming; the highly emollient butters deeply nourish dry under-eye skin while soothing Sandalwood helps reduce darkness and irritation.
dry_skin.usage_notes: Ideal for dry under-eye skin needing deep moisture and calming care

oily_skin.ingredients: Kokum Butter, Red Sandal Powder, Sandal Aroma Oil
oily_skin.benefits_explanation: Tone correction and cooling; Red Sandal helps improve skin texture and clarity while providing natural cooling to calm inflammation in the under-eye area.
oily_skin.usage_notes: Ideal for oily under-eye skin needing tone correction and cooling care

dull_skin.ingredients: Kokum Butter, Red Sandal Powder, Sandal Aroma Oil
dull_skin.benefits_explanation: Tone correction and cooling; Red Sandal traditionally improves skin texture and clarity while providing a natural cooling effect to calm inflammation and reduce under-eye dullness.
dull_skin.usage_notes: Ideal for dull under-eye skin needing cooling, soothing, and tone correction

sensitive_skin.ingredients: Kokum Butter, Goat Milk Powder, Lavender Aroma Oil
sensitive_skin.benefits_explanation: Extreme soothing and gentle renewal; Goat Milk provides mild lactic acid exfoliation and deep moisture while Lavender calms sensitive under-eye skin.
sensitive_skin.usage_notes: Perfect for sensitive under-eye skin needing soothing, gentle renewal, and moisture

people_working_outdoors.description: Recommendations for people exposed to sun, dust, and heat

normal_skin.benefits_explanation: Daily exposure requires deep cleansing and healing. Oats gently scrub away accumulated dust and dead skin. Turmeric and Honey provide strong antiseptic, anti-inflammatory, and healing properties to counter sun/heat damage.
normal_skin.usage_notes: Deep cleansing and healing for outdoor exposure

lifestyle_recommendations.description: Skin issue–based targeted recommendations for normal skin

office_workers.ingredients: Pure Lily Extract, Vetiver Essential Oil, Activated Charcoal Powder, Natural Kaolin Clay
office_workers.benefits_explanation: Gentle detox and pore cleansing; charcoal and clay detoxify pores without stripping

gym_goers.ingredients: Kokum Butter, Neem Extract, Neem Powder, Neem Oil, Basil Oil
gym_goers.benefits_explanation: Targeted anti-acne care with potent antibacterial and antifungal ingredients

nightlife_party_goers.ingredients: Kokum Butter, Neem Extract, Neem Powder, Neem Oil, Basil Oil
nightlife_party_goers.benefits_explanation: Potent antibacterial blend to purify dull, acne-prone skin

luxury_lifestyle_lovers.ingredients: Pure Lily Extract, Vetiver Essential Oil, Activated Charcoal Powder, Natural Kaolin Clay
luxury_lifestyle_lovers.benefits_explanation: Gentle detox suitable for sensitive skin, unclogs pores without irritation

students_young_professionals.ingredients: Kashmirii Kesar, Saffron Oil, Thick Milk Cream, Shea Butter, Kokum Butter
students_young_professionals.benefits_explanation: Brightening and anti-aging; saffron and milk cream intensely moisturize

dry_sensitive_skin_people.ingredients: Kokum Butter, Kesar Extract, Turmeric Powder
dry_sensitive_skin_people.benefits_explanation: Powerful brightening and anti-inflammatory care for oily skin

coffee_lovers.ingredients: Kokum Butter, Kesar Extract, Turmeric Powder
coffee_lovers.benefits_explanation: Brightens dull skin while reducing dark spots

romantic_emotional_balance_seekers.ingredients: Kashmirii Kesar, Saffron Oil, Thick Milk Cream, Shea Butter, Kokum Butter
romantic_emotional_balance_seekers.benefits_explanation: Brightening + intense moisture without irritating sensitive skin

adventurers_travelers.ingredients: Kashmirii Kesar, Saffron Oil, Thick Milk Cream, Shea Butter, Kokum Butter
adventurers_travelers.benefits_explanation: Brightening and anti-aging with deep moisturization for scar reduction

ayurveda_seekers.ingredients: Kokum Butter, Kesar Extract, Turmeric Powder
ayurveda_seekers.benefits_explanation: Anti-inflammatory and brightening—ideal for oily, scar-prone skin

normal_skin_general_recommendations.description: Comprehensive product recommendations for normal skin types with detailed benefits

purity_guard.benefits_explanation: Natural antibacterial protection, fights acne, keeps skin clean & stress-free.

calm_essence.benefits_explanation: Goat milk deeply moisturizes, lavender calms sensitivity & stress, balances pH.

rose_revive.benefits_explanation: Rose refreshes and softens skin, natural scrub removes dull layers, uplifts mood.

hair_vitalizer.benefits_explanation: Strengthens hair roots, prevents dandruff, natural shine without chemicals.

tulsi.skin_benefits: Helps reduce inflammation, purifies skin, soothes irritation
tulsi.ayurvedic_significance: Sacred herb with powerful healing properties

neem.skin_benefits: Controls sebum production, fights acne-causing bacteria, clears pores

kesar_saffron.skin_benefits: Evens skin tone, reduces dark spots, provides natural glow
kesar_saffron.traditional_use: Used in royal beauty treatments for centuries

milk.skin_benefits: Natural moisturizer, gentle AHA exfoliation, skin nourishment

turmeric.skin_benefits: Reduces inflammation, promotes healing, enhances brightness and evenness
turmeric.traditional_use: Ancient Ayurvedic remedy for skin health and beauty

sandalwood.skin_benefits: Calms irritated skin, provides cooling effect, reduces inflammation
sandalwood.traditional_significance: Sacred wood used in traditional beauty treatments

almond.skin_benefits: Provides gentle nourishment, moisturizes, protects with antioxidants

honey.skin_benefits: Deep moisturizing, natural antiseptic action, promotes healing
honey.special_properties: Natural humectant that draws moisture to the skin

oats.skin_benefits: Provides gentle physical exfoliation, soothes irritation, encourages cell turnover
oats.texture_benefits: Natural scrub that smooths skin texture

rose.skin_benefits: Soothes sensitive skin, provides hydration, aids in healing and revitalization
rose.traditional_use: Symbol of beauty and luxury in skincare

lemon.skin_benefits: Brightens complexion, tightens pores, provides gentle exfoliation

mushk_musk.skin_benefits: Provides uplifting sensory experience, enhances product appeal
mushk_musk.usage_note: Primarily for fragrance and sensory enhancement

coffee.skin_benefits: Reduces puffiness, stimulates circulation, provides antioxidant protection, brightening effect
coffee.special_properties: Caffeine helps tighten blood vessels and reduce dark circles

berries.skin_benefits: Protects against free radical damage, provides anti-inflammatory care, brightens complexion
berries.special_properties: Coffee Berry Extract is particularly rich in antioxidants

goat_milk.skin_benefits: Provides mild anti-aging benefits, gentle exfoliation, deep nourishment
goat_milk.special_properties: Natural source of Vitamin A and gentle AHA

lavender.skin_benefits: Reduces redness and irritation, calms sensitive skin, promotes healing
lavender.traditional_use: Known for its calming and therapeutic properties in aromatherapy and skincare

oudh.skin_benefits: Provides deep moisturization, anti-aging benefits, antioxidant protection, and luxurious aromatherapy experience
oudh.traditional_use: Prized in Middle Eastern and Asian cultures for its exotic fragrance and therapeutic properties, historically associated with royalty and luxury
oudh.special_properties: One of the most expensive and sought-after aromatic ingredients in the world

reeta.hair_benefits: Natural cleansing without stripping oils, gentle on scalp, creates natural lather
reeta.traditional_use: Traditional Indian hair cleanser, known as 'soap nuts', used for centuries for gentle hair washing
reeta.special_properties: 100% natural surfactant, eco-friendly alternative to chemical shampoos

amla.hair_benefits: Strengthens hair follicles, prevents premature graying, adds natural shine, reduces hair fall
amla.traditional_use: Revered in Ayurveda as 'Amalaki', considered one of the most potent rejuvenating herbs for hair and overall health
amla.special_properties: One of the richest natural sources of Vitamin C, essential for collagen production

active_compounds: Vitamins A, C, D, E, K
shikakai.hair_benefits: Natural conditioning, prevents dandruff, adds shine, maintains scalp pH balance
shikakai.traditional_use: Known as 'fruit for hair' in Sanskrit, traditional Ayurvedic hair cleanser and conditioner
shikakai.special_properties: Natural pH of 5.5-6.5, perfectly matches hair's natural pH, acts as both cleanser and conditioner

general_instructions: Use lukewarm water for best results
Follow with appropriate moisturizer if needed

frequency.sensitive_skin: Start with alternate days, increase as tolerated
frequency.normal_skin: Once or twice daily as needed

precautions: Always perform patch test for sensitive skin
